response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? ist das wirklich notwendig? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #konsumkultur"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? is it really necessary? #dataprotection #privacy #consumerculture"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data, questioning whether it is truly necessary. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #konsumkultur (consumer culture) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
